pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw:
Currently this is not able to pass CI because it does not generate any `test_results`, which jenkins is insisting upon having. If anyone has ideas for how we could go about generating test results for `ign-cmake`, it might be good to incorporate a rough draft in this PR.

I know @scpeters had been putting some effort into unit tests for `ign-cmake`, so if there has been progress on that, maybe it can be used here.
content.html:
Currently this is not able to pass CI because it does not generate any test_results, which jenkins is insisting upon having. If anyone has ideas for how we could go about generating test results for ign-cmake, it might be good to incorporate a rough draft in this PR.

I know @scpeters had been putting some effort into unit tests for ign-cmake, so if there has been progress on that, maybe it can be used here.
